name: Super Plumber Bros - Global Game Jam 2020
name_original: Super Plumber Bros - Global Game Jam 2020
description: In Super Plumber Bros you are tasked with repairing objects in your client's boiler room. With your trusty tools repair gas and water leaks before the time runs out, each repair grants you more time. The more leaks repair the higher your score. Warning: Game audio may be loud, lower volume before you play.
